    • Constructor Detail

      • ConnectedComponentsSegmentation

        public ConnectedComponentsSegmentation(ImageCore image,
                                       MetaDataRetriever.RetrievalPolicy policyOverride,
                                       RenderTool renderToolOutput,
                                       GuiFramework guiFramework)
        Parameters:
        image - The input Image for the sequence of processes
        policyOverride - A common policy to retrieve metadata, overriding the policies of the individual processes. If MetaDataRetriever.RetrievalPolicy.Unspecified, the policies can be chosen independently for the different processes, or the default can be used.
        renderToolOutput - The too to render the output of the process
        guiFramework - The Graphical User Interface Framework for human machine interface.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • ConnectedComponentsSegmentation

        public ConnectedComponentsSegmentation(ImageCore image,
                                       MetaDataRetriever.RetrievalPolicy policyOverride)
        The render tool used is the ImageCore implementer's preferred display tool.
        Parameters:
        image - The input Image for the sequence of processes
        policyOverride - A common policy to retrieve metadata, overriding the policies of the individual processes. If MetaDataRetriever.RetrievalPolicy.Unspecified, the policies can be chosen independently for the different processes, or the default can be used.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getConcreteProcessMetaData

        public ConnectedComponentsSegmentation.ProcessMetaData getConcreteProcessMetaData(java.lang.String metaDataTitle,
                                                                                  MetaDataRetriever.RetrievalPolicy policy,
                                                                                  java.lang.String subdir)
        Description copied from interface: PolicyImageInputOutput
        The concrete instance of this has a Concrete MetaData, which contains the specific parameters for this process. This is not to be confused with the returned value of GenericProcess.getConfig(), which contains the (possibly larger or even disjoint) total metadata to be retrieved, including metadata for the children processes.
        Specified by:
        getConcreteProcessMetaData in interface PolicyImageInputOutput
        Specified by:
        getConcreteProcessMetaData in class ProcessImageInputOutputGeneric
        Parameters:
        metaDataTitle - Title for the metadata tha determines the metadata file name.
        policy - Policy for retrieval of the metadata (file, dialog box...)
        subdir - Sub-directory of the default process metadata directory in which to look for the metadata.
        Returns:
        The (possibly empty) concrete metadata set instance with the specific parameters used directly by this process.
        See Also:
        ProcessImageInputOutputGeneric.getConcreteProcessMetaData(java.lang.String, wrapScienceJ.metaData.container.MetaDataRetriever.RetrievalPolicy, java.lang.String)
